title: Dark Angels looking for Top laner and Jungler!
body:
Hey there my team **Dark Angels** is looking for some members to be able to play in some tournament, and see if we can develop together as a team! 

Looking for:
- Top Laner
- Jungler

We hope that you live inside W.A. as we will be attending lane events hosted in Perth only! ( https://rflan.org )

Our current ranking is around Bronze to Silver, anyone around these rankings are welcome to join us!
On occasion we may have a few scrim with the Sister team **Dark Vengeance** just to help train eachother! 

We use the discord server linked on this thread as our main base for communication, all team updates and notifications happen here. If you're new to discord, it's a free application that you can use either your Internet browser or download the client to access!

We hope to hear from you soon!

Please Note: The team captain for **Dark Angels** is **Sir Dawnfire** on league! Either message him on the client, or reply to this thread! Thank you!

replies.body: Im Gold top main, ill play if u want? can play tanks/carries
Will get back to you on this. Please join the discord server in the mean time
As of now, I think we still are!
i live in perth rockingham can play top or jungle if u need a player.

Hi, I'm the leader of my team. We are looking for people who are potential and follow the instruction. I received a gold in s6 almost platinum in another server. However, since I moved to Australia, some of my team follow me up to here. We are welcome to have new members. If you are interest add JLYFireGod and leave some massage there, saying your name and what you good at. Looking forward to be my crew member.
Although, if you are looking for a scrim partner, We are more than happy to have a few games against your team!
Sorry man, this is my team I am looking for members for
